name: Crawlers LLC
description:
Submission for DATT 2310, Lab 2 group 1: Aspen Sykes, Cameron Johnson, Connor Spagnuolo, Dennis Snegiroff, John Sangster, Sydnie Linardatos

Crawlers LLC is a game about dungeon crawling for profit! Invade dungeons, defeat enemies, and escape to the surface to sell your loot!

Controls: 

  • WASD / Arrow Keys : Movement
  • Space : Attack
  • E : Interact
  • I : Inventory
